value:
I have prepared my curriculum for
the winter festival.$k$pI want everyone to have a good time,
so clear explanations of each and
every custom are a must.

This reminds me of my days teaching
Roy and Lilina. I took them to some
festivals then.

When I exchange gifts on a night like
this...I feel close to everyone.

I saw a poster that said, "Hurry in and
order your winter festival presents at
Anna's!"$k$pSeems like this is a great time to turn
a profit, isn't it?

I worked hard to make this outfit for
the festival, but I was in a bit of a
rush. Does it look like I got it right?

I bring you glad tidings! We're in the
middle of celebrating the winter
festival with $Nf.

It's wonderful how the festival has
everybody smiling and feeling warm
toward one another.

The festival is just getting started.
Let's have some fun!
Brrrr. I didn't expect it to be so chilly!

The true pleasure of the winter
festival is giving gifts. I'll happily
accept this one with thanks.

I am Cecilia, Mage General of Etruria.
If you want to know all about the
winter festival, I'll teach you!

I studied the winter festival
extensively so I could teach
others about it.$k$pHeroes gather here from across the
realms, and that means diverse value
systems come together here, too.$k$pThat said, I believe everyone can
enjoy a festival. We all like having fun,
no matter where we come from.$k$pMy hope was that those who knew
only war could smile, if even for just
a moment.$k$pIf that moment at the festival could
reside in their hearts...nothing would
make me happier.
それっ！
どう？
きゃああっ！
だめっ
Time for a lesson.
Start praying.
This is a blessing.
Just as expected.
It's almost spring...
Let's see...
This is traditional clothing for the winter festival.
Hm? You have a mischevious streak, don't you? Did you used to tease your teachers?
I happen to have a spare outfit for the winter festival if you'd like to try one on.
Teaching others is a good chance to learn something yourself.
Let me know if you'd like to learn more about the winter festival. I'm happy to teach!
Enemies are likely to underestimate my skills in this outfit... Might be a viable strategy.
I would love it if you and I could learn more from each other.
Let's try that.
That's a difficult one...
What's your answer?
